quotes: 2007. In 2009, Andris Piebalgs received the 'Diamond Prize' from the Regional Chamber of Commerce in Katowice (Poland)
In 2009, Andris Piebalgs received the 'Diamond Prize' from the Regional Chamber of Commerce in Katowice (Poland)
In 2009, the Energy Efficiency Global Forum presented him the Energy Efficiency Visionary Awards
He was twice appointed Acting Commissioner for Financial Programming and the Budget in Janusz Lewandowski's stead, from 19 April 2014 – 25 May 2014
and from 1 July 2014 – 16 July 2014 after he took up his seat.
On 15 November 2004 when questioned by the European Parliament as the Commissioner Designate for Energy, Piebalgs stressed the importance of environmental considerations in energy policy
Hearing of the Commissioner Designate for Development took place on 11 January 2010 in the European Parliament.
